name: 8ot see 8ot do
description: 8oT see 8oT do is a minimal interaction game in which you have to program a dumb bot to achieve its minimal goals. The bot doesn't understand direct interaction and needs it's moves to be recorded. You basically have to record your movements according to the level and then on hitting the play button, the character follows your recorded commands. The bot goes to the objective without you having to do anything after recorded commands are followed.
